facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was 35.8 % in 2011.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Afghanistan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 30.3 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2013, 40.9 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 increased from 4.6 % in 2004 to 5.4% in 2013.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 1340 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 396 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 128.8 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 67.9 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 34.4 % in 2000 to 29.8% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 34.8 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament was 27.7108 % in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 0.96 % in 2000 to 84.14% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , 34 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 2.29023 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 1.91004 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -0.02 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 90.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums was 62.7 % in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 53.1707038879395 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Afghanistan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 2.29023 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 1.91004 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Afghanistan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest was 2.06782 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 0.11304 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 6.14129 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2012 , the intentional homicide rate was 6.35 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , there were about 42.3 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 2.21 % of GDP , down from 2.78 % in 2008

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 0.30 % in 2008 to 3.42% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.08 % of the population , up from nearly no coverage in 2004 .
